repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits.

summary.p: The Tirumurukāṟṟuppaṭai is a devotional poem, dated possibly to the 7th century of the Common Era, in praise of the Tamil god Murukaṉ. The poem, attributed to Nakkīrar, belongs to the Caṅkam corpus and to the Tamil Śaiva canonical works (Tirumuṟai).
The manuscript contains the commentary by Nacciṉārkkiṉiyar. The root-text is quoted in the commentary.

collation.desc: 1 folio = title page. No foliation. Double folio. Shelfmark on recto. Hand #1. With shelfmark: C/22.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation.

36 folios = Tirumurukāṟṟuppaṭai (text and commentary interspersed). No foliation. Tamil filiation [1]-36.
Commentary by Nacciṉārkkiṉiyar. Hand #2. 6 lines per page.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Double folio. 1 Kampar taṉippāṭal on recto, by hand #3; ownership statement on verso, by hand #4.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation, in spite of bore holes caused by insects.

additions.p: Marginal benedictions; title-page; marginal chapter headers (original ones crossed-out, while others, later added, are not blackened with soot); colophon; ownership statement; addenda: benedictions (U1, f[1]r, rm); 1 Kampar taṉippāṭal (U5: f[1]r).

binding.p: Mahogany woodcovers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: 1763 according to Vinson (1867-1896, p. 21). See colophon U3, f36r4.

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192. Legs d'Edouard Ariel. Le "legs Ariel" avait été fait à la Société Asiatique de Parisen 1855 (voir Rosny 1869) avant d'être transféré en 1866 à la Bibliothèque Nationale. Numéro d'inventaire A. 14-05.

provenance.p: Owned by Edouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Edouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Tirumurukaṟṟuppaṭai 1956. In: pattuppāṭṭu mūlamum maturaiyāciriyar pārattuvāci nacciṉārkkiṉiyaruraiyum. Ed. by U. Vē. Cāminātaiyar. Ceṉṉai: kapīr accukkūṭam.
Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris : E. Leroux. — See p.14.
Rosny, Léon de (1868). La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. Dans : Variétés orientales (p. 177-224). Paris : Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien (1867). Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls. Corrected proofreadings printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)” — See p. 21.

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lf = library foliation = lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.
